name: @suns-echoes/object-utils
description: The library of useful utilities for objects manipulations.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:src && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --exit --r ts-node/register -r chai/register-expect -r ./setup/test.ts
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run ts
scripts.check:full: npm run check && npm run coverage && npm outdated && npm audit
